alert.note: Alert for Ripley (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 3:43PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ripley County through 415 PM CST... At 342 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Doniphan, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Doniphan around 350 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Budapest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southeastern Missouri.
